title: Game is still in progress
body: So out of nowhere my client says lost connection, i reset my wifi and close the client once i reboot the client i login but my client says game is still in progress but i cant get into the game client

replies.body: Was this the Malzahar game?  It looks like the match was still going on, but your network could be running into blocks getting back to the game server.  Running on wifi is problematic, so using a wired for now can help rule out possibilities.  Otherwise, it may be best to stick to customs for now and run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network.
